name: Jinny
description: '''Jinny''' were an [[Italy|Italian]] 1990s [[Musical ensemble|band]] consisting of Alessandro Gilardi, Claudio Varola, Federico Di Bonaventura and Walter Cremonini and featured various singers including [[Sandra Chambers|Sandy Chambers]] and Carryl Varley as a [[lip-synching]] model for the music videos. Their most successful single is "[[Keep Warm]]", which was released in 1991 and re-released in 1995.
